name: aws-toolkit-vscode
description: Including CodeCatalyst, Infrastructure Composer, and support for Lambda, S3, CloudWatch Logs, CloudFormation, and many other services.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts && webpack --mode production
scripts.buildScripts: npm run generateNonCodeFiles && npm run copyFiles && npm run generateIcons && npm run generateSettings && npm run generateConfigurationAttributes && tsc -p ./ --noEmit
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts && webpack
scripts.webWatch: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts && webpack --mode development --watch
scripts.webCompile: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts && webpack --config-name web
scripts.testCompile: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts && npm run compileOnly
scripts.test: npm run testCompile && c8 --allowExternal ts-node ../core/scripts/test/launchTest.ts unit dist/test/unit/index.js ../core/dist/src/testFixtures/workspaceFolder
scripts.testE2E: npm run testCompile && c8 --allowExternal ts-node ../core/scripts/test/launchTest.ts e2e dist/test/e2e/index.js ../core/dist/src/testFixtures/workspaceFolder
scripts.testInteg: npm run testCompile && c8 --allowExternal ts-node ../core/scripts/test/launchTest.ts integration dist/test/integ/index.js ../core/dist/src/testFixtures/workspaceFolder
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts && tsc -watch -p ./

aws.profile.deprecationMessage: The current profile is now stored internally by the Toolkit.

aws.accessAnalyzer.policyChecks.checkNoN.description: File path or S3 path to a text document for CheckNoNewAccess custom check.

aws.accessAnalyzer.policyChecks.checkAcc.description: File path or S3 path to a text document for CheckAccessNotGranted custom check.

aws.accessAnalyzer.policyChecks.cloudFor.description: A JSON formatted file that specifies template parameter values, a stack policy, and tags. Only parameters are used from this file.

aws.sagemaker.studio.spaces.enableIdenti.description: Enable automatic filtration of spaces based on your AWS identity.

aws.mcp.enabled.description: Enable the MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for external tool integration.

aws.mcp.port.description: Port number for the MCP server to listen on.

view/item/context.when: view == aws.explorer && viewItem == awsLambdaNode || viewItem == awsRegionNode
view == aws.explorer && viewItem == awsLambdaNode || viewItem == awsRegionNode
view == aws.explorer && viewItem == awsLambdaNode || viewItem == awsRegionNode || viewItem == awsCloudFormationRootNode
